The user tightly clasps their hands together and extends their middle and index fingers, resembling the Tiger [[hand seal]].<ref name="c5">''Naruto'' chapter 5</ref> Using the full weight of their body, the user thrusts these four fingers between the target's buttocks. Despite the technique's dramatic name, it is not actually harmful. The pain is fairly extreme, however, so much so that, when [[Kakashi Hatake]] uses it on [[Naruto Uzumaki]], Naruto comically leaps into the air,<ref name="d1"/> travelling a fair distance. [[Sakura Haruno]] blushes to see it used and [[Sasuke Uchiha]] declares both Kakashi and Naruto "buffoons".<ref name="c5"/> The anime shows those who are familiar with One Thousand Years of Death are very unwilling to be subjected to it.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 3</ref> It has no effect on unconscious targets.<ref>''Naruto'' episode 53</ref>

Naruto later uses this technique against [[Gaara]]. Instead of his fingers, Naruto uses a [[kunai]] with an [[exploding tag]] attached. Unlike previous responses to the technique, [[Pakkun]] calls Naruto's attack "brilliant".<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 133, pages 7-9</ref>

== Trivia ==
* This technique's full name is {{translation|"Konohagakure [[Hiden]] Secret Taijutsu Technique: One Thousand Years of Death"|木ノ葉隠れ秘伝体術奥義・千年殺し|Konohagakure Hiden Taijutsu Ōgi: Sennen Goroshi|engtv=Hidden Leaf Village Secret Finger Jutsu: One Thousand Years of Death|viz=Konohagakure's Most Secret and Sacred Technique: One Thousand Years of Death|ukdvd=Secret Ninja Technique of the Hidden Leaf School, Death for 1000 Years|''English Games'' "Sacred Taijutsu: 1000 Years of Death"}}.
* The official name for this technique is ''Sennen Goroshi''. However, the name is sometimes thought erroneously to be {{translation|''Sennen Gurushi''|千年苦し}}, meaning something along the lines of "Thousand Years of Pain".
* This technique is modelled after the [[Wikipedia:Kancho|Kanchō]], a Japanese prank common among children.
* In chapter 5 of ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]'', [[Sakumo Hatake]] is said to be a user of the technique. At the end of the chapter, Kakashi, [[Might Guy]], and [[Rock Lee]] perform a collaboration technique they call  {{translation|"[[w:c:springtimeofyouth:Three Thousand Years of Death|Three Thousand Years of Death]]"|三千年殺し|San Sennen Goroshi}}.
